Title: Dead Men Tell Long Tales
Writer: Matthew Miller (created by), Chris Fedak, Matt Kester
Actors: Ioan Gruffudd, Alana De La Garza, Joel David Moore, Donnie Keshawarz
Plot: A deep sea salvage operator is killed after he finds gold on a sunken ship, the very ship Henry once sailed on in 1814 and on which he died the first time. Adam returns and thinks one of its treasures holds the answer to their immortality.
